name: Beauty Escort
description:
In this game, you will embark on a journey full of horror, adventure and fantasy, collect gold coins by fighting monsters, and then buy beautiful followers to create an army of beauties.
Let the beauties with long legs accompany you to explore a horror world full of Chinese Jiangshi theme!
With the theme of Chinese Jiangshi and beauty harems, the game brings players into a world that combines oriental horror and beauty harems, full of unknown challenges and opportunities.
All in all, this game is a collection of Chinese Jiangshi, beautiful harem, follower management strategy and other elements of adult fantasy game, will bring players a unique adult experience full of adventure and surprise. Come and join this magical adult world, explore its secrets and start your harem conquest journey!

Developers' comments


Hello everyone, I am the author.
This is a game I made alone and independently.
At first, I was just a programmer working in a game company and wanted to make my own games, then I taught myself art and started making my own games. At the very beginning when I was practicing making characters, I heard an art teacher say that male students like to do art to learn about the human body, and it's okay to watch porn, as long as they can learn.

Then I played a Japanese side scrolling adult game at that time, and felt that I could do better than him, and by the way, I learned to make female characters, so I started to make this game.

Because I found that Chinese zombies are rarely done, even those horror elements in China are rarely done, China actually has a lot of traditional folklore is not empty, was distorted, but there are still some catnip left to find.

Imagine if one day there really is that type of thing happening around you, just so there is a theory that can explain clearly these problems that science can't solve.

So I thought it would be a good idea to shed some light on something a little more real, so I added the element of Chinese ghosts and monsters.

The Western cross is not fake, nor is Asian Buddhism and Taoism, it's just so distorted that most people can't touch the real thing.

So take advantage of the opportunity to make your own game and get some ghosts and goblins.
